fields.name: version
docs: The data version for this account.

fields.name: rates
docs: The rates for this fee payer

fields.name: tokenVault
docs: The vault for tokens to be sent to

fields.name: paymentAccount
docs: The account sol is stored in

fields.name: lastPayerValue
docs: Used to track the last value of the payment account

accounts.name: FeePayerRates
docs: Rates for a set of fee payers

fields.name: version
docs: The data version of this account

fields.name: owningProfile
docs: The profile that owns this fee payer

fields.name: tokenMint
docs: The token mint for the sub tokens

fields.name: tokenOwner
docs: The owner of the token mint

fields.name: tokenLimit
docs: The max number of sub tokens per interaction

fields.name: conversionRate
docs: Math is to multiply `lamports * conversion_rate / 1_000_000_000 = sub_tokens`
A corollary to this is `conversion_rate = sub_tokens / sol`

errors.name: NotFirstInstruction
errors.msg: This is not the first instruction in the transaction

errors.name: NotLastInstruction
errors.msg: This is not the last instruction in the transaction

errors.name: InstructionIsCPI
errors.msg: The instruction was called in a CPI

errors.name: ConversionRateOutOfRange
errors.msg: The conversion rate is out of range

errors.name: InvalidComputeBudgetInstruction
errors.msg: The transaction includes a ComputeBudget instruction type that isn't supported by the fee payer
